channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.title: Report X-2024101571
item.description:
Report X-2024101571

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-27T18:24:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-17
  • City: BOSTON
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The shipment was discovered by Security and held. The inner contents were clothing and perfume. the 2 bottles of perfume are not full and there was no evidence of a spill, however 1 bottle has a capacity of 80ml (Hypnotic Vanilla Parfum Zara) is 50% full. The second bottle, Zara Golden Decade, capacity 30 ml, only 25% full. The shipment is being held for FAA investigation.
